data.name: Fractions
data.description:
In this kata, you will implement a fraction class using the given variables numerator and denominator.
Its functionalities are as follows: ```cpp fraction f1(1, 2); //creates a new fraction object with value equal to 1/2 fraction f2(3, 21); //creates 1/7; it should be able to reduce after any arithmetic is done fraction f3 = f1 + f2*2; //9/14 fraction f4 = f1 / f2; //7/2 fraction f5 = f1 - f2; //5/14 fraction f6 = f1 * f2; //1/14 ``` In other words, all fractions must be able to implement ```cpp +, -, *, /, == ``` for doing arithmetic on integers and fractions or fractions and fractions. The integer will always follow the fraction in operations.
The class header and method names are already provided. Have fun!
